About the Company: Simplex Papers Ltd is engaged in the business of manufacturing, selling, distributing, exporting, importing and otherwise dealing in all kinds of paper, including white printing paper, maplitho paper, craft paper, bond paper, ledger paper, tissue papers, cards of all kinds, card boards and card board papers, packing papers and any other kinds of special paper.The product range of the company includes Simplex Bond,Simplex Copier,Simplex Parchment,Simplex Ledger,Maplitho,S S Maplitho,Newsprint and High Bright S S Maplitho.
